means: 浮士德的，关于浮士德的
精神上得不到满足而苦恼的
为换取权力、知识或物质利益而牺牲精神的

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly a Faustian spirit of discontent and universal reform descends on you.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然间,你成了浮士德精神的化身,对现实不满,要实行世界性的改革.

sentence.Network_en: But in a moment of faustian proportions, I pretended to be straight.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一次浮士德的冲动下, 我假装自己是一位异性恋者.

sentence.Network_en: Even bonuses are back . Policymakers have made a Faustian bargain.
sentence.Network_cn: 政策制定者进行了一次浮士德式的交易.

list.abs: 15. 浮士德式的交易（Faustian bargain），也称魔鬼契约。根据传统基督教对巫术的看法，该契约是一个人与撒旦或其它恶魔订立的…
昨天跟你的对话中，我忽然想起这个字：浮士德交易（Faustian Bargain）。(继续阅读...) Dear 菲：又一次接到你的电话，感觉还是像 …

means.word_mean: 1. pertaining to or resembling or befitting Faust or Faustus especially in insatiably striving for worldly knowledge and power even at the price of spiritual values;

auth_sentence.content: Blessed with a soulful voice, he made an unveiled Faustian pact long ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blessed with a soulful voice, he made an unveiled Faustian pact long ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blessed with a soulful voice, he made an unveiled Faustian pact long ago.

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately, the Devil has all the best tunes, and a Faustian approach might suit Om better next time around.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unfortunately, the Devil has all the best tunes, and a Faustian approach might suit Om better next time around.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unfortunately, the Devil has all the best tunes, and a Faustian approach might suit Om better next time around.

auth_sentence.content: That's an extremely aggressive number for any mix of technologies, so it's a Faustian bargain.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's an extremely aggressive number for any mix of technologies, so it's a Faustian bargain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's an extremely aggressive number for any mix of technologies, so it's a Faustian bargain.
